dmca.title: Plagiarised 404 Page
dmca.body:
Dear Mr. ,

It has come to my attention that you've been utilizing a Flash file as the 404 (page does not exist error) page on your website, myfreepixels.net.

The file in question is not only stolen from my client's website, but in fact you did not even properly change the hyperlink - you are still using his bandwidth!

I insist you remove the offending files, as they are the intellectual property of my client and I cannot allow you to take credit for his creation.

Because my client
